sub_title: Reservoir Engineer | Operational Petroleum Engineer - Delivers project lifecycles of oil and gas reservoirs from discovery, appraisal, development, production and abandonment phases for top tier oil and gas operators
summary:
I am an experienced Reservoir Engineer | Operational Petroleum Engineer, with a proven track record of delivering complete project lifecycles of oil and gas reservoirs from discovery, appraisal, development, production and abandonment phases for top tier oil and gas operators across the North Sea.

I deliver field development planning, field optimisation, asset performance monitoring and operations with focus on quality and cost without compromising HSE values. I am highly experienced at performing simulation and classical reservoir engineering using the latest reservoir modelling techniques for conventional and unconventional reservoirs. Furthermore, I assess subsurface / surface risks and uncertainties, and resolve complex technical issues by implementing changes to maximise workflows in reservoir simulation, field performance and effective reservoir management.

During my career, I‚Äôve worked in many petroleum engineering roles, including Reservoir Engineer (Modelling Team), Reservoir Engineer / UK Asset Team and most recently Operational Petroleum Engineer for Wintershall Noordzee. My achievements include:

‚úÖ Wintershall Noordzee: Analysed integrated shutin and production data and created simple model based on (MBAL, Topaze, Saphir, Rubis) to estimate reserves faster, using classical reservoir engineering (PTA, RTA, P/Z) and created catalogue of regional data to benchmark 15 wells and rigless activities, reducing OPEX.

‚úÖ Wintershall Noordzee: Optimized gas production for both offshore platforms in the UK Southern North Sea by re-routing compressor trains and properly timing drilling of new wells, minimally impacting old platform with backout pressure and avoiding costly / early COP activities.

ùó†ùòÜ ùó¶ùóΩùó≤ùó∞ùó∂ùóÆùóπùó∂ùòÅùó∂ùó≤ùòÄ:

Reservoir Surveillance | Advanced Reservoir Simulation | Field Development Planning | Field Optimization | Reservoir Engineering | Decline Curve Analysis | Petroleum Engineering | Well Intervention | Performance Analysis | Uncertainty & Risk Modelling | Production Data Analysis | Reservoir Management | Reservoir Fluid Analysis | Performance Analysis | Well Drilling & Completion | Risk Management | Sampling & Data Acquisition | Reserves Estimation | Production Engineering | Water Breakthrough Prediction | Pressure/Rate Transient Analysis | Well Testing | Integrated Reservoir Modelling | Offshore Operations | Network Model Optimization | Well Design & Planning | Integrated Project Lifecycle | Surface & Subsurface Projects | Workflow Analysis | HSEQ & Process Safety

‚Ä¢ Trained, demonstrated, shared and supported junior staff and experienced reservoir engineers within the Wintershall Dea World in innovative techniques about reservoir simulation, pressure and rate transient analysis.', 'title': 'Reservoir Engineer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Rijswijk, South Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Wintershall Noordzee', 'description': 'I was employed as a Reservoir Engineer (UK Asset Team) and reported to the Asset Manager UK, working within the integrated modelling teams to support simulation studies at various phases of maturity (From Exploration & Appraisal to a Mature Field) in the UK Dutch Southern North Sea area.

ùóûùó≤ùòÜ ùóîùó∞ùóµùó∂ùó≤ùòÉùó≤ùó∫ùó≤ùóªùòÅùòÄ:

Supported integrated modelling teams for development of UK Dutch Southern North Sea gas field, including screening over 400 cases for field development using surface network model to generate probabilistic P10-P50-P90 profiles.
‚Ä¢ Maintained surface network models (Resolve/Tnav/Eclipse) to identify and progress short- and medium-term production enhancement opportunities for mature gas field.', 'title': 'Reservoir Engineer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Rijswijk, South Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Wintershall Noordzee', 'description': 'I was employed as a Reservoir Engineer (Modelling Team) and reported to the Integrated Reservoir Modelling Manager, building and updating simulation / dynamic models in support of multiple assets across the Danish, UK & Dutch North Sea sectors.

ùóûùó≤ùòÜ ùóîùó∞ùóµùó∂ùó≤ùòÉùó≤ùó∫ùó≤ùóªùòÅùòÄ:

Led uncertainty study to investigate impact of fracture and matrix parameters in an oil chalk reservoir using dual porosity, dual permeability blackoil model to select low, mid and high cases for use in concept select decision-making.
